structure.unit: LICENSING OF MOTOR VEHICLES, OPERATORS, AND TRAILERS

law.catch_line: Posting of notice about 1994 increases in fees of circuit clerks.
law.text: Immediately upon July 15, 1994, every circuit clerk shall post a permanent notice that the four dollar ($4) increase in the fee for an instruction permit, four dollar ($4) increase in the fee for a duplicate license, and the ten dollar ($10) increase in the fee for a license reinstatement were requested by the Kentucky Circuit Clerks Association. The notice shall be printed in bold face type of sufficient point size to be read from a distance of at least three (3) feet. The notice shall be posted in a conspicuous place to ensure that every person who enters the circuit clerk's office will readily see the notice.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 267, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1994.
